name: The Teleport
description:
Developer's Description:

1 - Sit on camera system.
2 - Transfer energy with the robot(WASD) (to finish the level).
3 - Eliminating monsters (they don't spawn randomly, they have a certain order-strategy.).
4 - Fix broken cameras.
5 - Creature notes are important.
(I accidentally deleted the game files. So I won't install the patch)

Creature Notes:








Story:

Our character is in a team of 4 people who are teleported to a spaceship that has not been heard from for a long time.When teleported, he will find himself in the midst of terrible events,and from now on his only purpose will be to escape.The only way to escape will have to restart a teleport machine and also protect himself from the creatures that come to abduct corpses from the spaceship at night.

How To Play:

The purpose of the game is to transfer the energy stored in the energy panels during the day to the teleport every night by means of a robot. Meanwhile, you need to protect yourself from the creatures approaching you.When you see a creature in the corridors, send a shockwave to stop its progress. Each creature has a different strategy and trait. You should check the cameras accordingly. Also to fix randomly broken cameras you need to go to camera location and fix it. When the energy in the energy panel is fully transferred, the process is completed and the level ends. As the level progresses, new creatures appear. It consists of 7 levels in total.
